entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:24 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 01:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.9°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -15.2°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
